entry.title: WIND WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:22 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 07:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:21 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 07:21 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:21 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
